cmp: 匕 (an ancient type of spoon, dagger/ladle)
比 ((particle used for comparison and "-er than")/to compare/to contrast/to gesture (with hands)/ratio, associate with/be near)
匕 (an ancient type of spoon, dagger/ladle)
mng: all, each and every, in all cases

exm.mng: all, each and every, in all cases
lit. not to know whether to laugh or cry (idiom), between laughter and tears
As You Like It, comedy by Shakespeare
can be found everywhere
suitable for both the young and the old
simply because, all because
both OK, all acceptable
all, without exception, complete, whole, entirely
every voice gives praise (idiom); with an extensive public reputation
lit. every tree or bush an enemy soldier (idiom); fig. to panic and treat everyone as an enemy, to feel beleaguered
known by everyone (idiom); well known, a household name
understood by everyone (idiom); well known, a household name
to be all the same way (literary)
understood by everyone (idiom); well known, a household name
appropriate to any place and any time (idiom); universally applicable, a panacea
exm.pyn: fàng zhī sì hǎi ér jiē zhǔn

exm.mng: see 一著不慎，滿盤皆輸|一着不慎，满盘皆输[yi1 zhao1 bu4 shen4 , man3 pan2 jie1 shu1]
to bring the entire nation to arms (idiom)
appropriate to any place and any time (idiom); universally applicable, a panacea
One careless move and the whole game is lost. (idiom)
exm.pyn: yī zhāo bù shèn , mǎn pán jiē shū

exm.mng: everything is ready, all we need is an east wind (idiom), lacking only one tiny crucial item, also written 萬事俱備，只欠東風|万事俱备，只欠东风
exm.pyn: wàn shì jiē bèi , zhǐ qiàn dōng fēng
